item.title: How to increase Virtual Ram on Your windows PC
item.dc:creator: Steve T Inc
item.description:
Virtual memory is a feature of an operating system that enables a computer to be able to compensate shortages of physical memory by transferring pages of data from random access memory to disk storage.

The post How to increase Virtual Ram on Your windows PC appeared first on Steve T Inc.
item.content:encoded:
First of all let us define virtual ram :

Virtual memory is a feature of an operating system that enables a computer to be able to compensate shortages of physical memory by transferring pages of data from random access memory to disk storage.

This process is done temporarily and is designed to work as a combination of RAM and space on the hard disk.

This means that when RAM runs low, virtual memory can move data from it to a space called a paging file. This process allows for RAM to be freed up so that a computer can complete the task.

Occasionally a user might be shown a message that says the virtual memory is running low, this means that either more RAM needs to be added, or the size of the paging file needs to be increased. click here to view source

so we have defined what virtual RAM is lets learn how to increase it in windows.

How to Increase Virtual RAM in windows PC

  1. Go to this PC

    Go on the windows search panel and type in “This PC” if you dont have the short cut on your Desktop.and click it

  2. After you have opened “This PC”,right click on your mouse(a box with information will popup) and click “Properties”

  3. Click on advance settings

    When you click on “properties” you will be taken to a page that show you detailed information about your PC(e.g. memory,RAM,Name and more) so click of the advanced system settings option to your upper left

  4. Another popup will appears

    After the popup appears click on settings in the performance tab

  5. Go to advanced again

    After clicking settings another popup will appear so go to the Advanced option. You will see the selected(Adjust the best performance of_Programs_. Just go and click change

  6. Select the selected box

    They will be a selected box written “Automatically manage paging file size for all drives”

  7. Click on your hard drive if not selected

    Click on your hard drive then click customize size,then input the amount of size you want to add to your Virtual RAM (do not exceed your existing hard drive size) then click set and then apply

  8. Restart Your PC

    Restart your pc for changes to take effect and go back to see if it was successful.Enjoy

The post How to increase Virtual Ram on Your windows PC appeared first on Steve T Inc.

item.title: How to create a wordpress site on 000Webhost (with images)- Steve T Inc
item.dc:creator: Steve T Inc
item.description:
Wordpress is one of the most utilized webpage manufacturers on the planet and a standout amongst other covering a level of 60% of Wordpress destinations on the Internet its everyone's fantasy to make a wordpress website and im gonna teach how to make one with 000webhost

The post How to create a wordpress site on 000Webhost (with images)- Steve T Inc appeared first on Steve T Inc.
item.content:encoded:
WordPress is one of the most utilized webpage manufacturers on the planet and a standout amongst other covering a level of 60% of WordPress destinations on the Internet its everyone’s fantasy to make a wordpress website and im gonna teach how to make one with 000webhost

The most effective method to make a WordPress site Step-By-Step

NOTE: Before making a wordpress site you need a space name and hsting plan.(If you are simply making a wordpress site yet without the enough cash you can get a free area from Freenom were you can get a space like .tk .ga .cf .ml for free[not recommended]. 
Four facilitating yoou can attempt free Hosting Services Like Github,000webhost,Infinity Free and then some 


The most effective method to make a wordpress webpage (000webhost instructional exercise) 

1) Go to 000webhost site by tapping the connection here

2) Click on the signin button on your far right.


3)You will be taken from the page like the one on the image bellow

  • If you have an account with 000webhost input your emal and password to log .
  • If you dont have an account click on the sign Up button below the google login option

4) Select the Create a new site button on your far right

5) Type in The name you would like to give to your website (note:the same info will be the same with th e you will use when loggin into your wordpress Dashboard so Remember them)

6)You will see three different Web Bulding tools make sure you select wordpress the one in the middle

7)You will then see this onption just note your passwords and user names down

8) Click the install button

9)Wait while wordpress is being installed it will take a while . Just be patient while its loading……….it might take a minute keep on waiting …………………

10)You will then see this page below just click go to Config page

11)You will then be taken to the wordpress login page(Just type in the passwords you used when in step 5

12) You will then be taken to the wordpress Dashboard there you can See many options to customize your wordpres site Just enjoy

The post How to create a wordpress site on 000Webhost (with images)- Steve T Inc appeared first on Steve T Inc.

item.title: 5 Most Dangerous hackers in The World
item.dc:creator: Steve T Inc
item.description:
1)Kevin Mitnick  .An original figure in American hacking, Kevin Mitnick got his beginning as a high schooler. In 1981, he was accused of taking PC manuals from Pacific Bell. In 1982, he

The post 5 Most Dangerous hackers in The World appeared first on Steve T Inc.
item.content:encoded:
1)Kevin Mitnick  .An original figure in American hacking, Kevin Mitnick got his beginning as a high schooler. In 1981, he was accused of taking PC manuals from Pacific Bell. In 1982, he hacked the North American Defense Command (NORAD), an accomplishment that enlivened the 1983 film War Games. In 1989, he hacked Digital Equipment Corporation’s (DEC) organize and made duplicates of their product.

2)anonymous

The group started in 2003 on 4chan message sheets in an anonymous gathering. The gathering displays little association and is approximately centered around the idea of social equity. For instance, in 2008 the gathering disagreed with the Church of Scientology and start impairing their sites, in this way contrarily affecting their inquiry rankings in Google and overpowering its fax machines with every single dark picture. In March 2008, a gathering of “Anons” walked passed Scientology revolves the world over wearing the now-renowned Guy Fawkes cover.

3)Adrian Lamo :

drián Alfonso Lamo Atwood  (February 20, 1981 – March 14, 2018) was an American threat analyst and hacker. Lamo first gained media attention for breaking into several high-profile computer networks, including those of The New York Times, Yahoo!, and Microsoft culminating in his 2003 arrest.

Lamo was best known for reporting U.S. soldier Chelsea Manning to Army criminal investigators in 2010  for leaking hundreds of thousands of sensitive U.S. government documents to WikiLeaks. Lamo died on March 14, 2018 at the age of 37. source

4)Jeanson James Ancheta :On May 9, 2006, Jeanson James Ancheta (born 1985) became the first person to be charged for controlling large numbers of hijacked computers or botnets. source

5)Matthew Bevan and Richard Pryce :Mathew Bevan (born 10 June 1974) is a British hacker from Cardiff, Wales. In 1996 he was arrested for hacking into secure U.S. Government networks under the handle Kuji. At the age of 21, he hacked into the files of the Griffiss Air Force Base Research Laboratory in New York. source

5)Michael Calce  :(born 1986, also known as MafiaBoy) is a security expert and former computer hacker from Île Bizard, Quebec who launched a series of highly publicized denial-of-service attacks in February 2000 against large commercial websites, including Yahoo!, Fifa.com, Amazon.com, Dell, Inc., E*TRADE, eBay, and CNN.  He also launched a series of failed simultaneous attacks against nine of the thirteen root name servers.

The post 5 Most Dangerous hackers in The World appeared first on Steve T Inc.
